description: This table extracts information about coverages received from an outside organization for a referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the referral update received from an outside organization. Multiple updates, each containing information about multiple coverages, can be received for a referral.

columns.name: OUT_CVG_VALID_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time as of which outside coverages received in a referral update from an outside organization are valid.
